description: This file defines a jQuery plugin for a crossword puzzle widget, including functions for initializing the puzzle, handling user interactions, calculating grid coordinates, building the puzzle grid and clues, and checking answers.

classes.name: puzInit
classes.description: Object containing methods for initializing and managing the crossword puzzle, including coordinate calculation, grid building, answer checking, and UI updates.

classes.name: nav
classes.description: Object managing navigation between clues and entries, including moving focus and updating active positions.

classes.name: util
classes.description: Utility functions for highlighting entries and clues, managing classes, and handling active positions.

methods.name: crossword
methods.description: Main function defining the crossword puzzle plugin, setting up puzzle data, event handlers, and internal logic.
